titleStmt.title: Words for a musical entertainment at the New-Theatre, in little Lincolns Inn fields; on the taking of Namur, and His Majesty's safe return. Set to music by Mr. John Eccles. Written by Mr. Motteux.
titleStmt.author: Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.
Eccles, John, d. 1735.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
